title: june 20: Just when you thought it was safe to get back in the water…
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the release of the film Jaws, a 1975 Steven Spielberg thriller and massive hit. The movie, which was Spielberg’s first big film, became the first summer blockbuster, and set the stage for Hollywood’s predilection for high-budget, high-return action-adventure films during the season. After, Maia reflects on a Brockhampton release. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
